# Frontend Team - Quick Type Reference

## ðŸ“¦ Types Generated by Swagger

When you generate TypeScript client from Swagger, you'll get:

### **For Slack Placeholders API:**

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/v1/automation/placeholders/slack`

**Type:**
```typescript
interface SlackPlaceholdersResponseDto {
  placeholders: SlackPlaceholderOutputDto[];
  example?: string;
}

interface SlackPlaceholderOutputDto {
  placeholder: string;    // "orderId"
  description: string;    // "Order ID"  
  example: string;        // "123"
}
```

**Usage:**
```typescript
const response = await api.getSlackPlaceholders();
console.log(response.placeholders);
// [
//   { placeholder: "orderId", description: "Order ID", example: "123" },
//   { placeholder: "customerName", description: "Customer name", example: "John Doe" },
//   { placeholder: "customerEmail", description: "Customer email address", example: "john@example.com" },
//   { placeholder: "total", description: "Order total amount", example: "150" },
//   { placeholder: "currency", description: "Currency code (CAD, USD, etc.)", example: "CAD" },
//   { placeholder: "itemCount", description: "Number of items in the order", example: "3" }
// ]
```

### **For All Automations API:**

**Endpoint:** `GET /api/v1/automation`

**Type:**
```typescript
interface AutomationConfigOutputDto {
  key: string;
  name: string;
  description: string;
  triggerEvent: string;      // Enum value
  toolType: string;         // Enum value
  isEnabled: boolean;
  parameters?: Record<string, any>;
}
```

### **For Update API:**

**Endpoint:** `PATCH /api/v1/automation/:key`

**Type:**
```typescript
interface UpdateAutomationConfigDto {
  isEnabled?: boolean;
  parameters?: Record<string, any>;
}
```

## ðŸŽ¯ Key Point for Frontend Team

**To get Slack placeholders programmatically:**

```typescript
// Call this endpoint to get all available placeholders
const { placeholders } = await api.getSlackPlaceholders();

// Each placeholder has:
// - placeholder: The key (e.g., "orderId")
// - description: What it represents (e.g., "Order ID")
// - example: Example value (e.g., "123")

// Use in UI to build custom messages
placeholders.forEach(p => {
  // Show: "{{orderId}} - Order ID"
  console.log(`{{${p.placeholder}}} - ${p.description}`);
});
```

**Plus Enums:**
- `ToolType` (email, sms, slack, whatsapp)
- `TriggerEvent` (order.created, order.paid, etc.)
